snippet.title: DoDonPachi Resurrection - Xbox 360
snippet.description:
The fifth game in the DonPachi series, from legendary shoot-em-up creator CAVE. DoDonPachi Resurrection takes the DonPachi Corps back into the action. Players will have the task of fighting hundreds of enemies while dodging thousands of bullets in this renowned bullet hell title. DoDonPachi Resurrection is converted directly from the Arcade version for the Xbox 360 in full HD resolution. The Xbox 360 release will be a deluxe edition featuring three different modes of gameplay and the game's soundtrack. The Black Label arrange mode will be available to download as DLC on the day of release.  This is Rising Star Games's second CAVE shoot-em-up of this year, following the hugely popular Deathsmiles.

DoDonPachi Resurrection is out on Xbox 360 in November 2011.

Visit Rising Star Games
http://www.risingstargames.com

Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/RisingStarGames
